component.name: Rambox Community Edition
component.summary: Put all your online Services in one Application!

description.p: Rambox gives you the possibility to add common services many times you need, all in one place. It is completely open source

This Program let you create seperate containers for different services and accounts in tabs and checks for notifications in the Background. This basically lets you convert as many websites as you want into desktop Application without having to Install
It's perfect for people who work with many services for business and private accounts. (unofficial Flatpak)
Disclosure: Rambox is not affiliated with any of the messaging apps offered.
(Note: You can buy a proprietary PRO version, but doesn't has a Flatpak yet)
